sentences.english: Zhigung Celestial Burial Ground has masters who are monks with Zhigungti Monastery of the Garyu Sect.
sentences.chinese: 直貢天葬場有來自噶舉派直貢替寺的喇嘛天葬師。

sentences.english: Zhigung Celestial Burial Ground has masters who are monks with Zhigungti Monastery of the Garyu Sect.
sentences.chinese: 直貢天葬場有來自噶舉派直貢替寺的喇嘛天葬師。

sentences.english: Upon invitation from relatives of the dead, the celestial burial master goes to investigate how the dead died.
sentences.chinese: 收到死者親屬邀請後，天葬師會去了解死者的死因。

sentences.english: When beggars die, they often pay for their burial.
sentences.chinese: 當一個乞丐去世，他們常爲其天葬。

sentences.english: A noted celestial burial master would make up to 30,000 Yuan a month.
sentences.chinese: 一個有名氣的天葬師一個月能收入近三萬元。

sentences.english: Celestial burial is not to be watched.
High in these hills, they still practice sky burials.
sentences.chinese: 在小山高點的地方，他們在舉行着天葬。

sentences.english: The sun was risen on the earth when Lot came to Zoar.
sentences.chinese: 屍體被帶到天葬臺的時候太陽還沒升出東方的地平線。

sentences.english: Most of the celestial burial masters are alcoholic.
sentences.chinese: 大部分天葬師都是酒鬼。

sentences.english: One day the proprietors of our hotel suggested that we go to see a sky burial north of town.
sentences.chinese: 有一天我們客棧的老闆建議我們去鎮北看看天葬。

sentences.english: Tibetans strive for celestial burial and the holy eagles are god's ambassadors.
sentences.chinese: 藏族講究天葬而神鷹就是天葬時神的使者。

sentences.english: Tibetans strive for celestial burial and the holy eagles are god's ambassadors.
sentences.chinese: 藏族講究天葬而神鷹就是天葬時神的使者。

sentences.english: The sun does not appear on the eastern horizon when the body is carried to the celestial burial ground.
sentences.chinese: 屍體被帶到天葬臺的時候太陽還沒升出東方的地平線。

sentences.english: According to old celestial burial masters, their fate in the pre-peaceful-liberation days was the worst.
sentences.chinese: 按老天葬師的說法，和平解放前他們的命運最苦。

sentences.english: The smoldering scent of juniper invites clusters of vultures to hover above the site.
sentences.chinese: 松枝的薰香引來了成羣的禿鷲在天葬臺的上空盤旋。

definition: Potala, winter palace of Dalai Lamas in Lhasa, Tibet
Sêrtar county (Tibetan: gser thar rdzong) in Garze Tibetan autonomous prefecture 甘孜藏族自治州[Gan1 zi1 Zang4 zu2 zi4 zhi4 zhou1], Sichuan (formerly in Kham province of Tibet)
Jokhang, main Buddhist temple in Lhasa, a sacred place of Tibetan Buddhism
burial of cremated remains at the foot of a tree
Kumbum (Chinese Ta'er), monastery in Qinhai, formerly Amdo province of Tibet
Labrang monastery, Tibetan: bLa-brang bkra-shis-'khyil, in Xiahe county 夏河縣|夏河县[Xia4 he2 xian4], Gannan Tibetan autonomous prefecture, Gansu, formerly Amdo province of Tibet
